biotools.summary: scLINE is an R package for dimension reduction of single-cell RNA-seq data. scLINE integrates the single-cell RNA-seq data and multiple gene networks collated from public databases, supplementing inter-gene interactions to solve the problem of missing information caused by drop-out events.

bioschemas.name: scLINE
